title: Thunderbird problems
content:
To be clear, I seriously doubt the problems I am encountering are TB's fault! The problems may be my fault since I've grown older, I've tended (believed) using new versions of software present my mind a BIGGER challenge than using the older software/version I have been successfully using? I'm still using Version115.10.1

After our ISP chose to start using Zimbra Oct. 7, 2025 and their tech support could not assist me in getting TB working the had me remove POP3 settings for TB and change to IMAP with their software.

FINALLY someone helped me get TB working with IMAP. For 3 days grrr. Now the ISP says I need to use their web mail, Zimbra.

So might downloading the current TB version and somehow get the In box, all the folder contnets etc. over - into the new TB help?

I was going to backup everything tonight, now I have little to NO hope, without help!

THANKS & remain WELL plus be SAFE!

Robin
creator: dulca

title: Difficulty importing e-mails from Apple Mail
content:
I‚Äôm on a Mac using the Sequoia OS (not ready to update yet to Tahoe). I recently left Microsoft Outlook, my e-mail client for years, because of all the crashing and when I would update, all the stored e-mails disappeared. I am now using Apple Mail and the export function doesn‚Äôt work most of the time. Apple tech support did some things that told me they are automatic backups, but I can‚Äôt see them.

I use Thunderbird on an old PC and would like to also use it on my Mac. However, when attempting to import, it starts and finishes in about one second, importing nothing. The files are in .mbox format. What am I doing wrong trying to import these files?

title: Mbox/PST
content: Buongiorno, il problema √® noto, Outlook adotta il formato PST che rende impossibile lo scambio di grandi quantitativi di messaggi con TB. Cos√¨ ho provato ad aggiungere una casella IMAP su TB spostando le mail, ma dopo qulche migliaio di messaggi non funziona pi√π, occorre farlo di decina in decina - follia! Accetto di pagare un software che converta i file Mbox in PST, tanto mi sembra di capire che sia l'unica soluzione, solo che ce ne sono a migliaia e in questo chiedo aiuto a voi che magari avete gi√† fatto esperienza o sapete comunque darmi un suggerimento. Grazie come sempre a chi offre aiuto.

title: Unable to export emails using ImportExportTools NG Add-on in Thunderbird
content:
Hi, I'm unable to extract the emails using the ImportExportTools NG add-on. I tried right-clicking on the local file under Local Folders, using the ImportExportTools NG > Export All Messages to Folder > CSV Format steps. However, after loading emails partially, I am getting the following error code repeatedly. Can you please help understand what is the issue and how to resolve this? I have 62175 emails that I need to export.

[Exception... "Component returned failure code: 0x804b0002 (NS_BINDING_ABORTED) [nsIScriptableInputStream.available]" nsresult: "0x804b0002 (NS_BINDING_ABORTED)" location: "JS frame :: chrome://mboximport/content/mboximport/exportTools.js :: IETstoreBody :: line 2767" data: no]

IETstoreBody@chrome://mboximport/content/mboximport/exportTools.js:2767:20 IETstoreHeaders@chrome://mboximport/content/mboximport/exportTools.js:2714:10 exportAllMsgsDelayed@chrome://mboximport/content/mboximport/exportTools.js:826:32

title: Perdita messaggi durante la copia da InBox a una cartella locale
content:
Nel fare una copia dalla cartella "Sent" di uno degli account configurati in Thunderbird, ad una cartella locale che uso come backup, sono andati perduti i messaggi inviati dal 18/10/2025 al 6/11/2025. Nel senso che da quel momento, i messaggi non sono pi√π disponibili ne nella cartella "Sent", ne nella cartella Locale di Thunderbird (dove ci sono tutti i messaggi spediti precedenti e successivi alle date indicate) e nemmeno sull'account di Aruba su cui l'account di Thunderbird √® configurato. Qualcuno sa come si possono recuperare.

Grazie
creator: claudio.lunghi
